main event: Two sixteen-year-old high school boys observed an unidentified flying object in Fort Mill, South Carolina on 19 October 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as oval shaped and larger than normal, About 3 times larger and brighter than Venus, The color changed from fire white to red when it moved, The sighting lasted about fifteen minutes, The object moved quickly but was not too fast and hovered before rapidly accelerating and disappearing.
sighted object: an oval-shaped object that was bright and changed colors
